name: Brick Shredder
description:
The goal of this game is to shred as many bricks as possible without destroying the shredder, which consists of several gears. This happens when all the gears of the shredder touch a brick at the same time.

This game requires a high level of concentration, since your own player consists of several objects that should all be kept in mind for a successful game.

The gears of the shredder can only be moved together using the left and right cursor keys.

When starting a new game, one of ten different levels can be selected, which differ in the number of oncoming bricks and gears.
